DOC.brief_summary: Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital provide long-term free medical service Indian Tibetans since July 2010 . The investigator plan investigate metabolic syndrome HIV infection Indian Tibetan community . The investigator survey prevalence risk factor mean HIV quick test questionnaire . Since lack prevalence survey metabolic syndrome HIV infection Tibetan colony India , investigiators carry survey support assistance Department Health Central Tibetan Government .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Metabolic Syndromes HIV Infections Indian Tibetans
DOC.criteria: Tibetan colony India nonTibetan colony India
